personal_info.title: Software Engineer
personal_info.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

professional_summary: Software Engineer with strong foundations in structured system design, clean architecture, and scalable web development. I apply disciplined engineering principles—clarity in design, predictable execution, and efficient delivery—to build reliable and maintainable software. Experienced in developing both front-end and back-end features using modern frameworks, integrating APIs, and contributing to modular architectures. Known for analytical problem-solving, calm execution under pressure, and the ability to turn complex requirements into stable solutions.

professional_experience.description: Developed and maintained full-stack application features using Laravel, React, and Node.js. Contributed to improving system structure through modular MVC patterns and clean architecture principles. Integrated third-party APIs to support logistics and courier operations. Worked within an Agile workflow, ensuring predictable delivery and stable deployments. Maintained a disciplined version control process using Git and documented technical changes to improve team communication and reduce ambiguity.

Worked on logistics and courier systems, focusing on system stability, real-time data processing, and multi-user optimization. Improved backend performance through structured code, testing, and deployment cycles. Contributed to version control discipline and CI/CD practices to ensure smooth feature rollouts. Applied modular design principles to increase maintainability and reduce production issues.

Provided networking support and infrastructure setup, including installation and configuration of local networks and hardware. Maintained compliance documentation, performance reporting, and technical logs. Gained foundational experience in networking concepts and processes, which later informed DevOps and system architecture practices.

education.focus: Software Engineering major with emphasis on algorithms, structured programming, database systems, and distributed computing. Strengthened analytical thinking and system design skills through practical coursework and applied projects.

Foundational training in systems development, network fundamentals, and infrastructure configuration. Gained early exposure to business intelligence, data workflows, and structured technical environments.
